plot: At the end of World War II, a small group of German soldiers who have been separated from the Wehrmacht battalion come across a strange house in the woods as they try to find they way home.
title: Dlaczego tutaj jestes
plot_es: At the end of World War II, a small group of German soldiers who have been separated from the Wehrmacht battalion come across a strange house in the woods as they try to find they way home.
